title: Problem-Based Gene Analysis Education Using the BLAST Tool

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Composed of microlearning content optimized for mobile environments, with continuous monitoring of learning effectiveness through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Understand and explain the basic principles of the BLAST tool and criteria for parameter settings
Identify and correct error causes in genetic sequence comparison results through case analysis
Develop the ability to scientifically interpret BLAST results through problem-based learning

resources: Virtual Dinosaur Gene Generation Experiment Materials
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
